document.full_text: three non-governmental groups said bahrain must halt human rights violations and a crackdown on hospitals where doctors and patients suspected of having joined pro-democracy protests were being arrested.
document.title: groups call on bahrain to stop hospital crackdown
lines_and_colors: three non-governmental groups said bahrain must halt human rights violations and a crackdown on hospitals where doctors and patients suspected of having joined pro-democracy protests were being arrested.
